General.Name: Shrenik Limited
General.Description: Shrenik Limited trades in and processes paper, pulp, and paperboard products in India. It offers writing and printing paper, uncoated maplitho paper, coated paper, bright paper, copier paper, duplex board, and folding box board products under the Shrenik Premium Copier Paper and Shrenik Premium Digital Paper brands. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
General.Address: 505-508, TEN/11, Beside Mardia Plaza, Ahmedabad, India, 380009
